LanguageData.OTC_GrenadeBelt_Acid.label: OTC grenade belt(Acid)
LanguageData.OTC_GrenadeBelt_Acid.description: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Acid damage on explode. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
LanguageData.Grenade_GrenadeBelt_OTC_Acid.label: OTC grenade(Acid)

They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby. Designed for use by Mercenaries.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
